details:
verb
- to cause to move around
= example: to cause to move around
= synonyms: mobilize, mobilise
- to cause to become widely known
= example: to cause to become widely known
= synonyms: diffuse
- to become widely known and passed on
= synonyms: spread
- to move around freely
= example: to move around freely
- to move through a space, circuit or system, returning to the starting point
= example: to move through a space, circuit or system, returning to the starting point
- to cause to move in a circuit or system
= example: to cause to move in a circuit or system
- to cause be distributed
= example: to cause be distributed
= synonyms: pass on, distribute, pass around
- to move in circles
= synonyms: circle
